column3: Central Government - Total revenue and grants

column34: For the fiscal year beginning 1 April. Includes electricity consumed in auxillary stations and losses in transmission and distribution system.

Data on Labor Force are estimates from the National Sample Survey (NSS) Reports, specifically, NSS Round 55 for 2000 (survey period July 1999-June 2000) and NSS Round 61 for 2005 (survey period July 2004-June 2005).
